pages.text: Walliserops is a trilobite that has a trident like protrusion at the tip of the head. The purpose of the trident is poorly understood, though they may have served a function similar to the horns of modern beetles like rhinoceros beetles.
$(l)Eats:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Breeds with:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Egg Type:$() Drops Egg$(br)$(l)Method of Obtaining:$() Bucket
